result.arabic_text: بَلۡ كَذَّبُواْ بِٱلۡحَقِّ لَمَّا جَآءَهُمۡ فَهُمۡ فِيٓ أَمۡرٖ مَّرِيجٍ
result.translation: Ahubwo rero, ababangikanyamana barahakanye bivuye inyuma Qor’ani igihe ibashikiriye, baraheza baguma bajuragirika mu vyiyumviro, batazi ico bafata n’ico bareka hagati y'ukwemera no guhakana.
